types.html:
jeu de massacre m (plural jeux de massacre)

  1. funfair attraction that involves rocking figures with a rag ball that one throws
  2. (figurative) attack meant to morally or politically discredit an adversary
trans: funfair attraction that involves rocking figures with a rag ball that one throws
